column4: how to get proftpd ? why apt-get install proftpd cannot be done in dapper??
I don't use proftp, but there's a tone of packages for it. have you searched synaptic for proftp?
where to searh synaptic for proftp??
I install server dapper, and I cant see any GUI on it, and cant use clt-f
here's a command to remember: apt-cache search . I did apt-cache search proftp
you mean, apt-cache search found nothing, right?
no, there is noting happened after I'm typing it
that means you don't have access to proftp, most likely. replace /etc/apt/sources.list with the contents of http://paste.ubuntu-nl.org/6666 if you are using dapper.
is that official source list from dapper??
no it is not. (me bites his tongue over official sources)
but they are very good, reliable sources anyway
now I can use apt-cache search ppssssxxx
then what should i do next?
